title: Dear Riot, Please remove my Evelynn Mastery 7
body:
I am a struggling old Eve main that just cant adapt to the new style. I own the NA club for eve mains that started since clubs released. I fell in love with her for what she was back then. While I can't deny the aesthetics look great on the new one and she has the bad@$$ factor now, I just can't find the same level of satisfaction I had with her old kit. Say what you want about level 1 stealth or an ult that didn't make sense, the fact is you removed my favorite champion and replaced it with a new one and made it look similar. Every time I queue with her trying to learn her new style I feel resent and disappointment. Seeing my profile with the high mastery 7 is a reminder of how crap I am of the new one compared to the old one. I will never reach the same level of satisfaction or skill with the new one. I'm just not mechanically gifted for assassins, nor patient enough to wait for fights to start.... simply put, I'm not meant to be with this new Evelynn. I accept this fact now, and I've started the search for a new main. maybe I'll play her from time to time, but all that I request is you do me solid, and just take out the mastery 7 and change it to 5. I really don't want to feel this way about old evelynn anymore...

I'll still keep my custom evelynn phone case though, new eve doesn't have the same splash.

Thx,
Rae
